text: I happen to dig being able to use whatever mystique I have to further the idea of peace.
author: Garrett Morris

text: The only important thing I have to say is that my father never fought against his country.
author: Zinedine Zidane

text: I declare that I will establish peace in this world.
author: Prem Rawat

text: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
author: Phyllis McGinley

text: Peace is the first thing the angels sang.
author: John Keble
